prompt:
Crea controller REST in package com.panda.events.controller con base path /api/events.
Endpoints:
- GET /api/events con query params: q, from, to, city, category, page(default 0), size(default 20)

- GET /api/events/{id} -> EventResponse
- POST /api/events -> 201 EventResponse (Body EventCreateRequest @Valid)
- PUT /api/events/{id} -> EventResponse (Body EventCreateRequest @Valid)
- DELETE /api/events/{id} -> 204
Parsing date: OffsetDateTime da string ISO-8601.
Usa EventService.
Aggiungi @CrossOrigin se serve ma preferisci CorsConfig.
